Stage 47
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Stage 47
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:17 pm:

Level 47

Ok, the ghost is going to move up and down, until all the boxes in it's way are destroyed and the naga and octopee will drop down.

Meanwhile.....you would have to box upwards, and make sure you go all the way near to the top until around 2-3 layers of the surface.

After that, create a box quickly and go to the left boxed area which is on the left side of the ghost, remember to destroy the box in which you cross on, hence the enemies can't follow you. Go around and destroy boxes and search for the key in the top/leftern part of the area. The key is NOT in the first row so don't worry and don't release the monsters at all costs. Once you find the key, box your way to the top and win.
